summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1754, for the improvement of Eleventh Avenue Northeast and Twelfth Avenue Northeast, each from East Fifty-fifth Street to University Boulevard and University Boulevard, from Eleventh Avenue Northeast to Twelfth Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, by laying water mains of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary gates, tees, and crosses necessary fort the reasonable water service of said district, under Ordinance No. 18653 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
